title: UnicodeDecodeError: 'gbk' codec can't decode byte 0x8c in position 27: illegal multibyte sequence

labels.name: wontfix
labels.description: This will not be worked on

body:
![微信截图_20200810193842](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8059137/89779331-abce4280-db41-11ea-9ded-c1771a3c3d07.png)

# 1.代码
`import paddlehub as hub

module = hub.Module(name="ernie_gen_couplet")

test_texts = ["大江向东我向西"]
test_texts
results = module.generate(texts=test_texts, use_gpu=True, beam_width=5)
for result in results:
    print(result)
`
# 2.报错
`[2020-08-10 19:37:22,252] [    INFO] - Installing ernie_gen_couplet module
[2020-08-10 19:37:22,578] [    INFO] - Module ernie_gen_couplet already installed in C:\Users\Administrator\.paddlehub\modules\ernie_gen_couplet
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "C:/Users/Administrator/PycharmProjects/cbowtest/test3.py", line 3, in <module>
    module = hub.Module(name="ernie_gen_couplet")
  File "C:\Anaconda3\envs\paddlegpu\lib\site-packages\paddlehub\module\module.py", line 102, in __new__
    name=name, version=version, **kwargs)
  File "C:\Anaconda3\envs\paddlegpu\lib\site-packages\paddlehub\module\module.py", line 178, in init_with_name
    return cls.init_with_directory(directory=module_dir[0], **kwargs)
  File "C:\Anaconda3\envs\paddlegpu\lib\site-packages\paddlehub\module\module.py", line 200, in init_with_directory
    user_module = _item(directory=directory, **kwargs)
  File "C:\Anaconda3\envs\paddlegpu\lib\site-packages\paddlehub\module\module.py", line 146, in __init__
    self._initialize(**kwargs)
  File "C:\Users\Administrator\.paddlehub\modules\ernie_gen_couplet\module.py", line 59, in _initialize
    for i, j in enumerate(ernie_vocab_file.readlines())
UnicodeDecodeError: 'gbk' codec can't decode byte 0x8c in position 27: illegal multibyte sequence`
